root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 4-1-3, translated into en
root.data:
- The percentage of students attending lower secondary school is the percentage of students attending lower secondary school compared to the total population aged 11-14 years old.

- The percentage of students attending lower secondary school at the correct age is the percentage of students aged 11-14 years who are attending lower secondary school compared to the total population aged 11-14.
